text: Sano wankwao (Ibrahima wali Sara) waliji ali chiimile, basi niwasechile (pakupikana yachonasiko cha wandu wa Lutwi ligongo lyakusakasya kwao nnope), basi nitwampele abali jakusengwasya (janti chakole mwanache lina lyakwe) Isihaka, soni panyuma pa Isihaka (chachipata chisukulu chakuwilanjikwa) Yaakubu
